header.#text:
Report on implementation of certain Medicare and Medicaid fraud detection and program integrity
			 provisions

text.#text:
Efforts to finalize plans and schedules for fully implementing and expanding the use of the
			 Integrated Data Repository, including actions taken to finalize,
			 implement, and manage plans for incorporating data into the Integrated
			 Data Repository and actions taken to define measurable financial benefits
			 expected from the implementation of the Integrated Data Repository.

header.#text: Integrated data repository

text.#text:
Actions taken to plan, schedule, and conduct training on the One Program Integrity System, a
			 Web-based portal and suite of software tools used to analyze and extract
			 data from the Integrated Data Repository, and actions taken to define
			 measurable financial benefits expected from the use of the One Program
			 Integrity System.

header.#text: One program integrity system
Report on integrated data repository and one program integrity system

			 the appropriate Congressional committees a report on the following:
